hero.title: Senior Fullstack Developer (JS/TS Focus)
hero.intro1: Software engineer with 10 years of experience.
hero.intro2: In my last four roles, I led the UI architecture of front-end applications and have experience leading up to 10 UI developers across multiple scrum teams.
hero.intro3: Highly hands-on with a strong focus on end-to-end testing (Cypress, Playwright) and owning/optimizing UI CI/CD pipelines.
hero.intro4: Experienced with multiple backend technologies—strongest with Node.js/NestJS, but comfortable with Ruby, .NET, and Java.
hero.intro5: Comfortable working independently or leading multiple developers in agile environments.
hero.intro6: I hold two MSc degrees—one in Parallel and Distributed Computing and another in IT Management.

postfinance.title: Lead Angular Developer
postfinance.subtitle: Analytics Team - Internal Reporting Tool
responsibilities: Developing advanced internal reporting tool for stakeholders to create reports and insights on PostFinance databases
Working with Angular 18, Angular Material, and ECharts
Leading end-to-end test implementation with Playwright
Setting up and maintaining GitLab CI/CD pipelines

suva.title: Lead Angular Developer
suva.subtitle: Internal Web Applications - Client Claims Processing
responsibilities: Developed and maintained four internal web applications used by ~500 colleagues
Built features using Angular 18, PrimeNG, and Redux
Created and maintained end-to-end tests with Playwright

swissre.title: Lead Angular / Java Developer
swissre.subtitle: Finance Department - Angular Modernization
responsibilities: Led UI architecture across multiple teams (10 front-end developers across 6 scrum teams)
Created a shared UI components library from scratch used by all teams (45+ components, based on Angular Material)
Built numerous Angular [8-17] applications to modernize finance department processes
Owned and maintained front-end Azure CI/CD pipelines
Created and maintained backend APIs in Java
Led Cypress end-to-end testing implementation with Docker

marksandspencer.title: Senior JS / React Developer
marksandspencer.subtitle: Sofa Configurator Project
responsibilities: Led development of store locator map integration using Vanilla JS and Bing Maps V8
Built interactive sofa configurator application using React.js

managed247.title: Lead Angular / Node Developer
managed247.subtitle: Cloud-based Real-time Analytics System
responsibilities: Architected full-stack application from scratch using Angular 6, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB
Built custom real-time data visualization using d3.js, Socket.io, and SignalR
Developed highly customizable dashboards using Gridster.js, RxJS, and Redux
Researched and implemented CI/CD pipeline using Docker, Codeship, and Quay.io

workforce.title: Angular Developer / Scrum Master
workforce.subtitle: Scheduling and Forecasting SaaS Solution
responsibilities: Facilitated scrum ceremonies including grooming, sprint planning, and retrospectives
Drove continuous improvement initiatives that increased team productivity
Increased Angular.js unit test coverage from 60% to 90%
Led automated end-to-end testing implementation

unisphere.title: Startup Co-founder
unisphere.subtitle: Cloud-based Virtual Learning Environment
responsibilities: Built Angular.js / Ruby on Rails MVP in 5 months, deployed to 5 universities
Selected to join both Strasbourg and Oxford incubators
Gained extensive experience in SaaS product lifecycle, UX/UI development, customer success, and investor pitching

cranfield.title: MSc in Distributed & Parallel Computing
cranfield.description: Focused on parallel computing and high-performance computing. Gained hands-on experience in virtualization, containerization, and cloud computing through the university's cutting-edge supercomputer facility ASTRAL.

esigelec.title: MSc in IT Management
esigelec.description: Developed comprehensive understanding of computer science through hands-on experience with multiple programming languages and technologies. Project-based curriculum built strong communication and collaboration skills.

mountaineering.title: Mountaineering
mountaineering.description: Passionate about alpine adventures including summiting Mont Blanc, tour skiing the Haute Route, and trail running in the mountains.

basketball.title: Basketball
basketball.description: Played competitively for 12 years in regional teams, developing teamwork, discipline, and leadership skills on and off the court.

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: Co-founded a tech startup, created mobile apps, contribute to open source projects, and maintain a development blog to share knowledge with the community.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.intro: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
